abstract: One new plan offers video streaming only, while another offers full Prime benefits. Both cost more than annual subscribers pay.
snippet: One new plan offers video streaming only, while another offers full Prime benefits. Both cost more than annual subscribers pay.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Amazon is introducing new options to subscribe to its Prime membership service on a monthly basis, a change that could make the company’s video service a tougher competitor to Netflix.

headline.main: Amazon Challenges Netflix by Opening Prime to Monthly Subscribers
headline.print_headline: Amazon Opens Prime to Monthly Subscriptions in Move to Challenge Netflix
